title: Gary Varvel, Indianapolis Star - Cartoonist Gary Varvel: Ignoring the debt
text: Cartoon Title: Cartoonist Gary Varvel: Ignoring the debt Keywords: Gary Varvel,The Indianapolis Star,Creators Syndicate,Bernie Sanders,Climate change,Global warming,Democrat,Federal debt,politics,Socialist,politics Caption: Presidential candidate Bernie Sanders says that climate change is the greatest threat to the United States. Meanwhile none of the Democratic candidates mentioned the over $18 trillion debt we are leaving to our children and grandchildren. Search AAEC
